content.value:
If a billionaire lives for 80 years, they would have $12.5m EACH YEAR, their entire life…

Nobody should be a billionaire.

People are starving, the earth is dying, & billionaires are shooting themselves into space for fun.
content.html: If a billionaire lives for 80 years, they would have $12.5m EACH YEAR, their entire life… Nobody should be a billionaire. People are starving, the earth is dying, & billionaires are shooting themselves into space for fun.
